${SHELL} ./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ CPPFLAGS="${CPPFLAGS+${CPPFLAGS}}" \ LDFLAGS="${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" \ PKG_CONFIG_PATH="\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGTKIMAGEVIEW_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBATK+${SB_VAR_LIBATK_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBCAIRO+${SB_VAR_LIBCAIRO_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE+${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBTTF+${SB_VAR_LIBTTF_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_GETTEXT+${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB+${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB_LIB}/\ ${SB_VAR_GCC_RT+${_gccsubdir}/}pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBFFI+${SB_VAR_LIBFFI_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB+${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB_LIB}/${_pysubdir}/lib/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGDKPIXBUF+${SB_VAR_LIBGDKPIXBUF_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGTK+${SB_VAR_LIBGTK_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGTK+:${SB_VAR_LIBGTK_LIB}/${_pysubdir}/lib/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBICONV+${SB_VAR_LIBICONV_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBPNG+${SB_VAR_LIBPNG_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBPANGO+${SB_VAR_LIBPANGO_LIB}/pkgconfig:}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBZ+${SB_VAR_LIBZ_LIB}/pkgconfig}" \ --disable-dependency-tracking \ --prefix=${_install_prefix}
module.install:
gmake install pyexecdir=${_install_prefix} pythondir=${_install_prefix}
# install path for Python's include.paths.d ${SB_PATH_INSTALL} -m 755 -o root -g 0 -d \ ${_install_prefix}/include.paths.d cat >${_install_prefix}/include.paths.d/99-${SB_PROG_NAME} <<_EOT_ ${_install_prefix} _EOT_
